X.i.3.A.1.a
.
Definition:  Special Act Award
A
special act award
is an award of benefits authorized under a private law.
Reference
:  For more information on special acts, see
38 CFR 3.801
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Jurisdiction for Special Act and Foreign Residency Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
